#include<iostream>
#define lli long long int
#define ci cin>>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
    lli m, n;
    int carry, total, t, r, s;
    for(int i=0;;i++) {
        ci m>>n;
       if(!m && !n) 
       break;
       total=carry=0;
       while(m || n) 
       {
          r=m%10; 
          s=n%10;
          if(r+s+carry>=10) {
             total++;
             carry=(r+s+carry)/10;
          }
          else carry=0;
          n/=10;
          m/=10;
       }
       if(!total) 
       cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
       else if(total==1) 
       cout<<"1 carry operation.\n";
       else 
       cout<<total<<" carry operations.\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
